text: Ate unham vica kujha loka ajihe hana, jihare tuhade vala kana laga'unde hana, ithom taka ki jadom' tuhade tom (suna ke) bahara a jande hana tam gi'ana vali'am nu puchade hana ki unham ne huna ki akhi'a hai?Iha uha loka hana, jinha de dilam te alaha ne muhara la diti hai. Ate uha apani'am ichavam da palana karade hana
